ComicInfo.Summary:
Wisp and Twinkle run into trouble in a magical land when they find themselves face to face with mad scientist Murky and his sidekick Lurky, but as they try to make their way to safety, they discover an important part of what it means to be Rainbow Brite!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Paulina Ganucheau | 1 | B | Classic Cover B | ? | 2 | C/RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive "Virgin Art" Edition Variant Cover | Paulina Ganucheau | 3 | D/RI | 1:20 Retailer Incentive "Virgin Art" Edition Variant Cover | ? | 4 |
